research_content:
Perfect! Now I have comprehensive information. Let me compile the research findings in a clear report format.

## Veteran-Friendly Employer Programs: Data Availability Research

I've completed research on all five programs you requested. Here's what I found regarding data access for each:

---

### 1. HIRE Vets Medallion Program (DOL)

**URL:** https://www.hirevets.gov/

**Employer Count:** 2,000+ medallion awardees

**Public Data Access:**
- **Interactive Map:** https://www.hirevets.gov/awardees
- **Searchable Table:** https://www.hirevets.gov/awardees_table
- **Data.gov Dataset:** Registered on data.gov but **restricted download** - no file downloads currently provided; may become available in future
- **No API:** No public API documented

**Data Available:**
- Company name, location
- Award level and year
- Hiring/retention statistics from application forms
- Contact information (via interactive table)

**For Bulk Access:**
- Contact: HIREVets@dol.gov
- May need to request bulk data download or API access directly from DOL

**Connector Feasibility:** Moderate - Would need to scrape awardees table or request bulk data from DOL

---

### 2. Veteran Jobs Mission (Formerly 100,000 Jobs Mission)

**URL:** https://veteranjobsmission.com/

**Member Company Count:** 315+ companies (as of latest reporting)

**Public Data Access:**
- **Member Directory:** https://veteranjobsmission.com/meet-the-coalition
- **Format:** Interactive logo view or list view
- **Download:** No export/CSV download functionality available
- **No API:** No public API documented

**Data Available:**
- Company names, logos
- Individual company profiles accessible via website

**For Bulk Access:**
- Would need to contact Veteran Jobs Mission directly
- No documented data export mechanism

**Connector Feasibility:** Low - Would require web scraping or direct contact with organization

---

### 3. Military Spouse Employment Partnership (MSEP)

**URL:** https://msepjobs.militaryonesource.mil/msep/

**Partner Count:** 950+ companies (360,000+ military spouses hired since 2011)

**Public Data Access:**
- **Partner Portal:** https://myseco.militaryonesource.mil/portal/msep/partners
- **Search Function:** Employers searchable by industry and benefits
- **No CSV Download:** Partner list appears searchable only through portal interface
- **No API:** No public API documented

**Data Available:**
- Company names and details
- Industry classification
- Benefits offered
- Job listings

**For Bulk Access:**
- Contact Military OneSource directly
- May require special access request for bulk data
- Currently limited to portal search functionality

**Connector Feasibility:** Low-Moderate - Would need to contact Military OneSource for structured data access or implement web scraping of searchable portal

---

### 4. Helmets to Hardhats

**URL:** https://helmetstohardhats.org/ | Jobs Portal: https://careers.helmetstohardhats.org/

**Contractor Network:** ~82,000 signatory contractors (co-sponsored by 15 construction trade unions)

**Public Data Access:**
- **Job Search Portal:** https://careers.helmetstohardhats.org/
- **Contractor List:** Not publicly downloadable
- **No CSV/API:** No bulk data export or API documented
- **Contractor Requirements:** Only union-signatory contractors in good standing listed

**Data Available:**
- Job postings from registered contractors
- Contractor contact information (partial)
- Apprenticeship program listings

**For Bulk Access:**
- Contact Helmets to Hardhats directly: (866) 741-6210
- Would likely need to request through AGC or union affiliates
- No documented self-service data access

**Connector Feasibility:** Low - Restricted to job board scraping; contractor database not publicly accessible

---

### 5. Hiring Our Heroes (U.S. Chamber of Commerce Foundation)

**URL:** https://www.hiringourheroes.org/

**Partner Count:** 40+ VEAC (Veteran Employment Advisory Council) companies + expanding Friends of HOH network

**Public Data Access:**
- **Partners Page:** https://www.hiringourheroes.org/partners/
- **Format:** Logo displays + text lists for different council tiers
- **No Download:** No bulk export or CSV download available
- **No API:** No public API documented

**Data Available:**
- Company names (logos and text)
- Council membership tier (VEAC Chairman's Circle, VEAC Advisory Council, etc.)
- Job board: https://jobs.hiringourheroes.org

**For Bulk Access:**
- Contact through website form or hohfellowships@uschamber.com
- No self-service data export mechanism documented

**Connector Feasibility:** Low - Would need contact-based data request or logo scraping

---

## Summary Table: Data Access Comparison

| Program | Data Type | Access Method | Bulk Download | API | Employer Count | Difficulty |
|---------|-----------|----------------|--------------|-----|-----------------|------------|
| **HIRE Vets** | Structured | Interactive table + data.gov | No (restricted) | No | 2,000+ | Medium |
| **Veteran Jobs Mission** | Semi-structured | Website directory | No | No | 315+ | Low |
| **MSEP** | Semi-structured | MySECO portal search | No | No | 950+ | Low-Medium |
| **Helmets to Hardhats** | Job listings | Job board portal | No | No | 82,000* | Low |
| **Hiring Our Heroes** | Semi-structured | Website directory | No | No | 40+ (core) | Low |

*Contractor network size, not individual employers in public database

---

## Recommended Approach for Connector Development

**Best Prospects for Structured Data:**

1. **HIRE Vets Medallion** (Highest Quality)
   - Most structured data available
   - Data.gov presence suggests formal dataset
   - Recommend reaching out to DOL for API access or bulk data export
   - Could scrape awardees table as interim solution

2. **MSEP** (Moderate)
   - Large employer count (950+)
   - Portal has searchable interface
   - Could implement web scraping of search results
   - Contact Military OneSource for bulk access

3. **Helmets to Hardhats** (Specialized)
   - Best for construction/apprenticeship focus
   - ~82,000 contractor network via AGC partnership
   - Would need to work with AGC or trade unions for data access

**Lower Priority (Limited Structured Data):**
- Veteran Jobs Mission: Requires scraping or direct request
- Hiring Our Heroes: Small core network, primarily visibility tool

---

## Next Steps for Implementation

1. **Contact data holders directly** for API or bulk data agreements:
   - DOL HVMP: HIREVets@dol.gov
   - MSEP: Military OneSource contact form
   - AGC (for Helmets to Hardhats): https://www.agc.org/

2. **Evaluate data.gov integration** for HIRE Vets if bulk API access becomes available

3. **Implement web scraping** as interim solution for programs without structured data export

4. **Document data freshness requirements** - most programs update lists periodically; establish refresh cadence in connector metadata

Sources:
- [HIRE Vets Medallion Program](https://www.hirevets.gov/)
- [HIRE Vets Awardees Map](https://www.hirevets.gov/awardees)
- [HIRE Vets Awardees Table](https://www.hirevets.gov/awardees_table)
- [HIRE Veterans Medallion Program on data.gov](https://catalog.data.gov/dataset/hire-veterans-medallion-program-online-application-system)
- [Veteran Jobs Mission](https://veteranjobsmission.com/)
- [Veteran Jobs Mission - Meet the Coalition](https://veteranjobsmission.com/meet-the-coalition)
- [Military Spouse Employment Partnership](https://msepjobs.militaryonesource.mil/msep/)
- [MSEP Partners Portal](https://myseco.militaryonesource.mil/portal/msep/partners)
- [Helmets to Hardhats](https://helmetstohardhats.org/)
- [Helmets to Hardhats Jobs Portal](https://careers.helmetstohardhats.org/)
- [Associated General Contractors - Helmets to Hardhats](https://www.agc.org/helmets-hardhats)
- [Hiring Our Heroes](https://www.hiringourheroes.org/)
- [Hiring Our Heroes Partners](https://www.hiringourheroes.org/partners/)
- [Hiring Our Heroes Job Board](https://jobs.hiringourheroes.org/)
